closeStoryToolTip: Close the story monologue and proceed in the learning space
sidebar_mainMenuToolTip: Back to the welcome page of the 3d-learning environment
sidebar_learningWorldToolTip: Back to the learning world menu
sidebar_learningSpaceToolTip: Back to the learning space menu
sidebar_helpToolTip: Opens the lepl window and gives further information about AdLer
sidebar_worldCompleteToolTip: Opens the learning world completion window - activated when the current learning world is completed
sidebar_narrativeFrameworkToolTip: Opens the narrative framework, displayed before the first learning space
requirementSpaceScoreToolTip: Currently solved learning elements in this space
pointSpaceScoreToolTip: Shows earned points before continuing to next learning space
worldScoreToolTip: Shows relative solved learning elements in this learning world
xpBarToolTip: Current level and earned experience points
